notes: Processes volatile and molecular feedstocks (water ice, carbon and nitrogen volatiles, carbon-chain organics) into propellants, cryogenic polymers, and biosphere support materials.
throughput_mult scales batch completion speed relative to the recipe's base build_time_s.
efficiency is the fraction of listed input materials consumed; values below 1.0 represent improved molecular yield.
max_recipe_tier is the highest min_tech_tier recipe this unit can process.
max_concurrent_recipes is the number of recipe slots running in parallel.
